reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Already on first acquaintance we were touched by the hospitality and warm-hearted hostess and host Mrs & Mr Maureen and Warner Edgel.
reviews.title: Almost Heaven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bedroom was nice, clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: What a B&B Experience Should Be

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom was provided with delightful products.
reviews.title: Great B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The next morning we were pampered with a delicious breakfast.
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B

likes.liked: — Proximity to outdoor activities and couple who ran B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B close to Zion National Park!

reviews.text: This is a lovely home in Rockville, close to Zion. We were desperate for a place when the rest of town was booked and we were not only accomodated with our daughter, but the owners went out of their way to make us comfortable. The home is lovely, our daughter loved the animals which were brought out after she asked to meet them. The pool is awesome, perfect after a HOT day in Zion! Breakfast was just fine, especially for $100 a night! We will be back!
reviews.title: A wonderful place!

reviews.text: Lovely Scottish woman owner - very friendly and helpful - a real animal lover. Rooms clean and bed comfortable. Too much bric-a-brac in the rooms, she could clean out some of the "decorative" clutter. Couple seem new to the B&B business - could use a bit of variety for breakfast. One of the highlights was access to the new swimming pool - it was a hit on the 97 degree days.
reviews.title: Friendly people, Check out the Pool

reviews.text: This is the place to stay! The couple that owns this b&b are the most fun down to earth business owners you will ever meet. They will do just about anything to accomodate you while you stay in their lovely rooms. They truly enjoy their work and guests and it shows in how you are treated when you visit. Everyone is like family. Definitely check this one out if you are going to Zion.
reviews.title: This is the place to stay

likes.liked: — The rooms are beautiful and I felt very comfortable staying here.

reviews.title: She is nice and they take pets
reviews.text: The owner is new to the bed and breakfast business however her place is nice, clean and she tries to make you happy. She does not make the beds or clean the room while you are there.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This has been a highlight of our vacation. Previous reviews have captured the facts about the excellent rooms, the beautiful pool and view from the patio, and the splendid breakfasts. Maureen and Warner provide a really warm Scottish-American brand of hospitality, and it is apparent that they really enjoy their work as hosts.
reviews.title: First class accommodation

reviews.text: We had a problem with our car hire, and Warner provided us with unlimited use of their phone, and there is also free wireless internet access for guests, a service not mentioned in their website. The final touch was Warner's expert guidance to help us re-route our onward travel, which proved an excellent choice.
reviews.title: no better place to go

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After one night we wished we had booked a whole week rather than just 2 nights, and we would love to return.
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B, convenient to Zion Natl Park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm glad I stayed in Desert Thistle B&B for 2 days on May 22 and 23rd.
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B next to Zion National Park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ideally located nearby Zion, the B&B is a contemporary house with a nice garden, swimming pool and a river after the garden.
reviews.title: Great place to stay when visitng Zion National Park
